name: Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Breakthrough
name_original: Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Breakthrough
description:
Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Breakthrough is a shooter game developed by TKO Software. It came out on 22-09-2003. It was published by Electronic Arts. On review aggregator Metacritic, Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Breakthrough has a score of 72. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Breakthrough is available on PC.
Matt Powers and Steven Spielberg produced the game. It was directed by Keith Francart and Steven Spielberg.
